QuestData.Title: A Most Somber Task
QuestData.Description: I must now ask you to complete a most somber task.$B$BWarp Splinter used to act as guardian to all of the Botanica. He is now impure, and must be taken down.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I truly wish it had not come to this.
QuestData.LogDescription: A'dal has asked you to slay Warp Splinter in the Botanica of Tempest Keep.
QuestData.RewardText: He was a noble guardian in life. His presence will be missed.
